org.openrdf.rio.ParseErrorListener

  • Packages that use ParseErrorListener 
    Package Description
    org.openrdf.rio
    General classes and interfaces for RDF parsers and RDF writers.
    org.openrdf.rio.helpers
    Provides helpers classes for Rio.

      RDFParser RDFParser.setParseErrorListener(ParseErrorListener el)
      Sets the ParseErrorListener that will be notified of any errors that this parser finds during parsing.
